invoice_with_order.sql:
SELECT
  invoice.*
FROM
  invoice,
  json_each(invoice.json_invoice_record_line)
WHERE
  json_extract(value, '$.order_record_num') = :order_record_num

on_order_fund_code.sql:
SELECT
  orders.*
FROM
  orders,
  json_each(orders.cmf_data)
WHERE
  json_extract(value, '$.fund_code') = :fund_code
  and orders.order_status_code = 'o'
